<mapper namespace="com.example.demo.mapper.KurasuInfoMapper">
	<resultMap id="BaseResultMap"
		type="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		<id column="KURASU_ID" jdbcType="INTEGER" property="kurasuId" />
		<result column="KURASU_NAMAE" jdbcType="VARCHAR"
			property="kurasuNamae" />
		<result column="KURASU_KAMOKU" jdbcType="VARCHAR"
			property="kurasuKamoku" />
		<result column="TANTO_SENSEI" jdbcType="VARCHAR"
			property="tantoSensei" />
		<result column="DELETE_FLAG" jdbcType="INTEGER"
			property="deleteFlag" />
		<result column="MEMO" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="memo" />
		<result column="TOUROKUBI" jdbcType="DATE" property="tourokubi" />
		<result column="KOUSHINBI" jdbcType="DATE" property="koushinbi" />
		<result column="SAKUSEISHA" jdbcType="VARCHAR"
			property="sakuseisha" />
		<result column="YOBI_1" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="yobi1" />
		<result column="YOBI_2" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="yobi2" />
		<result column="YOBI_3" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="yobi3" />
	</resultMap>

	<sql id="syoSai">
		KURASU_ID, KURASU_NAMAE, KURASU_KAMOKU, TANTO_SENSEI, MEMO, TOUROKUBI,
		KOUSHINBI, SAKUSEISHA
	</sql>

	<select id="allKurasuInfo"
		resultType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo">

		select
		<include refid="Base_Column_List" />
		from kurasu_info
		where DELETE_FLAG = 0

	</select>

	<select id="singleKurasuInfo"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo"
		resultType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo">

		select
		<include refid="syoSai" />
		from kurasu_info

		<where>
			KURASU_ID = #{kurasuId}
			AND DELETE_FLAG = 0
		</where>

	</select>

	<update id="updateKurasuInfo"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo">

		update kurasu_info
		<set>
			<if test="kurasuNamae != null">KURASU_NAMAE = #{kurasuNamae},</if>
			<if test="kurasuKamoku != null">KURASU_KAMOKU = #{kurasuKamoku},</if>
			<if test="tantoSensei != null">TANTO_SENSEI = #{tantoSensei},</if>
			<if test="memo != null">MEMO = #{memo},</if>
			<if test="koushinbi != null">KOUSHINBI = #{koushinbi},</if>
		</set>
		where KURASU_ID = #{kurasuId}

	</update>
	
	<update id="logicalDelate"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo">
		
		update kurasu_info
		<set>
			DELETE_FLAG = 1,
		</set>
		where KURASU_ID = #{kurasuId}
	</update>

	<sql id="Example_Where_Clause">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		<where>
			<foreach collection="oredCriteria" item="criteria"
				separator="or">
				<if test="criteria.valid">
					<trim prefix="(" prefixOverrides="and" suffix=")">
						<foreach collection="criteria.criteria" item="criterion">
							<choose>
								<when test="criterion.noValue">
									and ${criterion.condition}
								</when>
								<when test="criterion.singleValue">
									and ${criterion.condition} #{criterion.value}
								</when>
								<when test="criterion.betweenValue">
									and ${criterion.condition} #{criterion.value} and
									#{criterion.secondValue}
								</when>
								<when test="criterion.listValue">
									and ${criterion.condition}
									<foreach close=")" collection="criterion.value"
										item="listItem" open="(" separator=",">
										#{listItem}
									</foreach>
								</when>
							</choose>
						</foreach>
					</trim>
				</if>
			</foreach>
		</where>
	</sql>
	<sql id="Update_By_Example_Where_Clause">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		<where>
			<foreach collection="example.oredCriteria" item="criteria"
				separator="or">
				<if test="criteria.valid">
					<trim prefix="(" prefixOverrides="and" suffix=")">
						<foreach collection="criteria.criteria" item="criterion">
							<choose>
								<when test="criterion.noValue">
									and ${criterion.condition}
								</when>
								<when test="criterion.singleValue">
									and ${criterion.condition} #{criterion.value}
								</when>
								<when test="criterion.betweenValue">
									and ${criterion.condition} #{criterion.value} and
									#{criterion.secondValue}
								</when>
								<when test="criterion.listValue">
									and ${criterion.condition}
									<foreach close=")" collection="criterion.value"
										item="listItem" open="(" separator=",">
										#{listItem}
									</foreach>
								</when>
							</choose>
						</foreach>
					</trim>
				</if>
			</foreach>
		</where>
	</sql>
	<sql id="Base_Column_List">

	</sql>
	<select id="selectByExample"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfoExample"
		resultMap="BaseResultMap">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		select
		<if test="distinct">
			distinct
		</if>
		<include refid="Base_Column_List" />
		from kurasu_info
		<if test="_parameter != null">
			<include refid="Example_Where_Clause" />
		</if>
		<if test="orderByClause != null">
			order by ${orderByClause}
		</if>
	</select>
	<select id="selectByPrimaryKey"
		parameterType="java.lang.Integer" resultMap="BaseResultMap">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		select
		<include refid="Base_Column_List" />
		from kurasu_info
		where KURASU_ID = #{kurasuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
	</select>
	<delete id="deleteByPrimaryKey"
		parameterType="java.lang.Integer">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		delete from kurasu_info
		where KURASU_ID = #{kurasuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
	</delete>
	<delete id="deleteByExample"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfoExample">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		delete from kurasu_info
		<if test="_parameter != null">
			<include refid="Example_Where_Clause" />
		</if>
	</delete>
	<insert id="insertKurasuInfo"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo"
		useGeneratedKeys="true"
		keyProperty="kurasuId">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		insert into kurasu_info (KURASU_NAMAE, KURASU_KAMOKU,
		TANTO_SENSEI, MEMO, KOUSHINBI, SAKUSEISHA,
		YOBI_1, YOBI_2, YOBI_3
		)
		values (#{kurasuNamae,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
		#{kurasuKamoku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
		#{tantoSensei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
		#{koushinbi,jdbcType=DATE},
		#{sakuseisha,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
		#{yobi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yobi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yobi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
		)
	</insert>
	<insert id="insertSelective"
		parameterType="com.example.demo.entity.KurasuInfo">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		insert into kurasu_info
		<trim prefix="(" suffix=")" suffixOverrides=",">
			<if test="kurasuId != null">
				KURASU_ID,
			</if>
			<if test="kurasuNamae != null">
				KURASU_NAMAE,
			</if>
			<if test="kurasuKamoku != null">
				KURASU_KAMOKU,
			</if>
			<if test="tantoSensei != null">
				TANTO_SENSEI,
			</if>
			<if test="deleteFlag != null">
				DELETE_FLAG,
			</if>
			<if test="memo != null">
				MEMO,
			</if>
			<if test="tourokubi != null">
				TOUROKUBI,
			</if>
			<if test="koushinbi != null">
				KOUSHINBI,
			</if>
			<if test="sakuseisha != null">
				SAKUSEISHA,
			</if>
			<if test="yobi1 != null">
				YOBI_1,
			</if>
			<if test="yobi2 != null">
				YOBI_2,
			</if>
			<if test="yobi3 != null">
				YOBI_3,
			</if>
		</trim>
		<trim prefix="values (" suffix=")" suffixOverrides=",">
			<if test="kurasuId != null">
				#{kurasuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
			</if>
			<if test="kurasuNamae != null">
				#{kurasuNamae,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="kurasuKamoku != null">
				#{kurasuKamoku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="tantoSensei != null">
				#{tantoSensei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="deleteFlag != null">
				#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
			</if>
			<if test="memo != null">
				#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="tourokubi != null">
				#{tourokubi,jdbcType=DATE},
			</if>
			<if test="koushinbi != null">
				#{koushinbi,jdbcType=DATE},
			</if>
			<if test="sakuseisha != null">
				#{sakuseisha,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="yobi1 != null">
				#{yobi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="yobi2 != null">
				#{yobi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="yobi3 != null">
				#{yobi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
		</trim>
	</insert>

	<update id="updateByExampleSelective" parameterType="map">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by 
			MyBatis Generator, do not modify. This element was generated on Thu Oct 23 
			22:46:06 JST 2025. -->
		update kurasu_info
		<set>
			<if test="row.kurasuId != null">
				KURASU_ID = #{row.kurasuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
			</if>
			<if test="row.kurasuNamae != null">
				KURASU_NAMAE = #{row.kurasuNamae,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.kurasuKamoku != null">
				KURASU_KAMOKU = #{row.kurasuKamoku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.tantoSensei != null">
				TANTO_SENSEI = #{row.tantoSensei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.deleteFlag != null">
				DELETE_FLAG = #{row.deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
			</if>
			<if test="row.memo != null">
				MEMO = #{row.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.tourokubi != null">
				TOUROKUBI = #{row.tourokubi,jdbcType=DATE},
			</if>
			<if test="row.koushinbi != null">
				KOUSHINBI = #{row.koushinbi,jdbcType=DATE},
			</if>
			<if test="row.sakuseisha != null">
				SAKUSEISHA = #{row.sakuseisha,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.yobi1 != null">
				YOBI_1 = #{row.yobi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.yobi2 != null">
				YOBI_2 = #{row.yobi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
			<if test="row.yobi3 != null">
				YOBI_3 = #{row.yobi3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
			</if>
		</set>
		<if test="example != null">
			<include refid="Update_By_Example_Where_Clause" />
		</if>
	</update>
	<update id="updateByExample" parameterType="map">
		<!-- WARNING - @mbg.generated This element is automatically generated by
